survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on employees' satisfaction with air quality in their workspace and its impact on their productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall air quality in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity. Consider mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall air quality in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Ensure checkboxes are clearly labeled.

script.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How does the air quality in your workspace affect your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to capture nuanced responses.

script.question_text: How does the air quality in your workspace affect your productivity?

questions.question_text: Have you reported any air quality concerns to your facilities or HR team?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question. Follow up with Q5 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you reported any air quality concerns to your facilities or HR team?

questions.question_text: Please describe the response you received after reporting your air quality concerns.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Ensure text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Please describe the response you received after reporting your air quality concerns.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the air quality in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to encourage creative suggestions. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-ended (text box with character limit)

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the air quality in your workspace?
